name: Payday Cake Bars
author: Shari Landewe
instructions: Step one, mix cake mix, melted butter and egg in mixing bowl. Spread in 9 x 13 inch ungreased cake pan. Bake at 300Â° for 15 minutes. Step two, spread marshmallows over baked cake and bake for 3 more minutes. Step three, melt corn syrup, chips, and vanilla. Add peanuts and Rice Krispies. Spread over marshmallow layer. Let cool and cut into bars.
